pizzerias.name: Roberta's
pizzerias.specialty: Da Kine (tomato sauce, mozzarella, pineapple, ham, jalapeños, Hawaiian sea salt)
pizzerias.description: Hipster-chic pizza destination in Bushwick offering wood-fired Neapolitan-inspired pies. Their Hawaiian pizza gets an upgrade with jalapeños and Hawaiian sea salt for extra flavor depth.

pizzerias.name: Paulie Gee's
pizzerias.specialty: Pineapple Upside Down Pie (tomato sauce, mozzarella, pineapple, speck, calabrian chili honey)
pizzerias.description: Artisanal pizzeria serving creative wood-fired pies in Greenpoint. Their pineapple pizza combines sweet and heat with calabrian chili honey and premium speck instead of standard ham.

pizzerias.name: Emmy Squared
pizzerias.specialty: Big Kahuna (Detroit-style square pizza with red sauce, mozzarella, pineapple, bacon, jalapeños, ranch)
pizzerias.description: Detroit-style square pizza spot known for thick, crispy-edged pies. Their Hawaiian-inspired pizza uses bacon instead of ham and adds ranch drizzle and jalapeños for a sweet-savory-spicy combo.
